adjectives.description: vortical (comparative more vortical, superlative most vortical)

entries.meaning: Of or pertaining to a vortex; containing vortices; moving in a vortex. [from 17th c.]
examples: He assumed, in brief, that infinite space is filled with infinite matter; that matter was originally in a chaotic, formless condition; that the cosmical bodies arose at first from vortical motions in the original mass.
